description: As one of the Doll Knights, he controls life. Transformed into Super Doll Izumi . The image color is green. When a person with a green calling ring calls or when a crisis approaches, a necklace- type calling choker illuminates and activates by casting a spell. It has a baton- type weapon "Light Circle". Although the light circle can be thrown like a boomerang , it is often used as a ray technique (capture ring, whip, etc.)
name: Doll Izumi
